title: The Weedless Widow
description: Antiques picker and ex-FBI agent Jeff Talbot's good friend and fishing buddy, Bill Rhodes, has a collection of fly fishing lures that any collector would kill for. But when someone actually does just that, Jeff must use all his skills to catch his friend's murderer. Making the leap from estate sales to the Internet, he tracks the victim's stolen antique lures to an online auction site.But Jeff's uncanny knack for turning up the unexpected backfires when he gets too close to solving the crime -- and the killer abducts his housebound, agoraphobic wife. Can Jeff reel in the killer in time to save her?
author: Deborah Morgan
